languages.text: "В таком случае здорово, что путешествовать вам предстоит в компании злобных ремонтников инфернус. Парни, что мы думаем о том, чтобы кто-нибудь тронул при нас Лорд-капитана?" {n}Энрих довольно улыбается, слыша гневное, почти звериное рычание своих подчиненных.{/n}

"Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В таком случае здорово, что путешествовать вам предстоит в компании злобных ремонтников инфернус. Парни, что мы думаем о том, чтобы кто-нибудь тронул при нас Лорд-капитана?" {n}Энрих довольно улыбается, слыша гневное, почти звериное рычание своих подчиненных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then it's a good thing you will be traveling in the company of big bad Infernus repairmen. How do we feel about anyone hurting the Lord Captain in front of us, guys?" {n}Einrich smiles happily as he hears the angry, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

"Then it's a good thing you will be traveling in the company of big bad Infernus repairmen. How do we feel about anyone hurting the Lord Captain in front of us, guys?" {n}Einrich smiles happily as he hears the angry, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

"Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad Infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, boys?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

"Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad Infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, boys?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

"Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

"Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces es una suerte que viaje en compañía de unos reparadores infernus tan grandotes e intimidantes. Chicos, ¿a que no se os ocurriría hacerle nada a nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán?». {n}Einrich sonríe alegremente ante los gruñidos furiosos y casi bestiales de sus subordinados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces es una suerte que viaje en compañía de unos reparadores infernus tan grandotes e intimidantes. Chicos, ¿a que no se os ocurriría hacerle nada a nuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán?». {n}Einrich sonríe alegremente ante los gruñidos furiosos y casi bestiales de sus subordinados.{/n}

languages.text: 「それなら、これほど大きくて悪いインフェルヌスの修理工を連れて旅をするのは幸運なことです。目の前でロード・キャプテンに危害を加える連中がいたらどうする、野郎共？」{n}部下の猛烈な、ほとんど獣のようなうなり声に、アインリッヒは明るく笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、これほど大きくて悪いインフェルヌスの修理工を連れて旅をするのは幸運なことです。目の前でロード・キャプテンに危害を加える連中がいたらどうする、野郎共？」{n}部下の猛烈な、ほとんど獣のようなうなり声に、アインリッヒは明るく笑う。{/n}

languages.text: “那您可太幸运了，有我们这么一大群彪悍的修理工陪着您一同前进。嘿，小伙子们，要是有人打算在咱们面前伤害舰长大人，咱们该怎么办？”{n}听到这句话，艾因里奇的手下怒不可遏，爆发出几乎带着兽性的咆哮。艾因里奇露出了灿烂的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那您可太幸运了，有我们这么一大群彪悍的修理工陪着您一同前进。嘿，小伙子们，要是有人打算在咱们面前伤害舰长大人，咱们该怎么办？”{n}听到这句话，艾因里奇的手下怒不可遏，爆发出几乎带着兽性的咆哮。艾因里奇露出了灿烂的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Dann ist es ja ein Glück, dass Ihr von solch großen, kräftigen Infernus-Technikern begleitet werdet. Was sagen wir dazu, dass jemand dem Lord Captain vor unseren Augen schaden möchte, Burschen?" {n}Einrich grinst breit ob des wilden, fast bestialischen Knurrens seiner Untergebenen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann ist es ja ein Glück, dass Ihr von solch großen, kräftigen Infernus-Technikern begleitet werdet. Was sagen wir dazu, dass jemand dem Lord Captain vor unseren Augen schaden möchte, Burschen?" {n}Einrich grinst breit ob des wilden, fast bestialischen Knurrens seiner Untergebenen.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, c'est une bonne chose que vous voyagiez en compagnie des solides gaillards de la guilde Infernus. Qu'est-ce qu'on pense de ceux qui voudraient faire du mal {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} sous nos yeux, les gars ? » {n}Einrich sourit de toutes ses dents tandis que ses subordonnés répondent par un concert de grognements furieux, presque bestiaux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, c'est une bonne chose que vous voyagiez en compagnie des solides gaillards de la guilde Infernus. Qu'est-ce qu'on pense de ceux qui voudraient faire du mal {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} sous nos yeux, les gars ? » {n}Einrich sourit de toutes ses dents tandis que ses subordonnés répondent par un concert de grognements furieux, presque bestiaux.{/n}

languages.text: "O hâlde böyle cüsseli, yiğit itfa tamiratçılarıyla yolculuk ediyor olmanız iyi. Milletin gözümüzün önünde Lord Kaptan'a zarar vermeye çalışmasına ne deriz gençler?" {n}Einrich, emrindekilerin öfkeli hatta âdeta hayvani hırıltılarını duyunca şevkle gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then it is fortunate you are travelling in the company of such big, bad infernus repairmen. How do we feel about people harming the Lord Captain in front of us, lads?" {n}Einrich smiles brightly at the furious, almost bestial growls of his subordinates.{/n}
